content.text:
# List of compositions by Emily Howard

This is a list of compositions by the composer Emily Howard sorted by genre, date of composition, title and scoring.
{| class="sortable wikitable"
! Genre
! Date
! Title
! Scoring
! Notes
|-valign="top"
| Orchestral || align=center|2002 || Passacaglia || for String orchestra ||

|-valign="top"

| Chamber || align=center|2011 || Ada sketches || for mezzo-soprano, flute, clarinet and percussion ||
